original_text: and they saw the God of Israel. There was under his feet as it were a pavement of sapphire stone, like the very heaven for clearness.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 하나님을 보니 그의 발 아래에는 청옥을 편 듯하고 하늘 같이 청명하더라

sentences.original_text: and they saw the God of Israel.
as it were a pavement of sapphire stone,
like the very heaven for clearness.
